    The CAD Coder

    Free SOLIDWORKS API [VBA + C#] Tutorials for Mechanical Engineers.

    Get Started

    Easy to Understand

    This website prepared for beginners especially for Mechanical engineers. Each article in this website is self-contained. These articles written in easy to understand language so that normal people can understand it.

    Focus What Matters

    Each article has Table of Content on right side. By using this, you can directly go to your interested area of article. This will help you to focus what matters to you.

    Future Path

    Currently, I am focusing on 2 things for this blog.
    1) Userform tutorials for each SOLIDWORKS article.
    2) Adding videos in SOLIDWORKS articles.
    I am also thinking of starting SOLIDWORKS C# API tutorial articles. Let me know what you think about it.
